definition: to hand over/to deliver/to pay (money)/to turn over/to make friends/to intersect (lines)/variant of 跤[jiao1]

sentences.english: While making friends, we should take care to select those who have such fine qualities.
sentences.chinese: 交友之时，就应选择具有这些优良品质的人。

sentences.english: You wanna read an article about women and online dating apps?
sentences.chinese: 你想读一篇关于女人和在线交友应用程序的文章吗？

sentences.english: You can opt to sign up for a specialized dating site.
sentences.chinese: 你可以尝试在一个专门的交友网站注册帐号。

sentences.english: Books and friends shoulde be few but good.
You can restrict messages, friend requests, comments, group invitations and instant messages.
sentences.chinese: 你可以限制留言，交友请求，邀请圈子和即时信息。

sentences.english: Many find that the game is a good way to make friends.
sentences.chinese: 许多人觉得这个游戏是个很好的交友平台。

sentences.english: Galhara also prefers the anonymity of online friendships.
sentences.chinese: 盖哈啦也偏爱线上交友的匿名方式。

sentences.english: How do you do social without the notions of friending or privacy?
sentences.chinese: 不了解交友或者隐私的理念，你怎样来社交？

sentences.english: But sister, you remember, friends, is absolutely not have the heart of the utilitarian.
sentences.chinese: 但是妹妹，你记住，交友是万万不能有功利之心的。

sentences.english: Only 10% of those surveyed said they will friend anyone.
sentences.chinese: 只有10%的受访者表示他们会同任何人交友。

sentences.english: While making friends, we should take care to select those who have such fine qualities. From Joozone. Com.
sentences.chinese: 交友之时，要谨慎选择具有这样美好品质的人。

sentences.english: Have but few friend, though much acquaintance.
The Philippines and Far Eastern countries do not condone online dating sites.
sentences.chinese: 菲律宾及远东国家反对网上交友配对网站。

sentences.english: French FriendFinder includes both English and French interfaces.
sentences.chinese: 法语交友中心包含了英语及法语介面。

sentences.english: But Facebook is not just about friending.

definition: to make friends/(dialect) to start an affair with sb
(slang) to hook up for a one night stand/booty call
to seek new friends through personal ads, dating apps etc
to seek a marriage partner/looking for a mate
to eat, drink and be merry (idiom)/to abandon oneself to a life of pleasure
(romantic) love/CL:個|个[ge4],場|场[chang3]/in love/to have an affair
to get to know sb/to meet sb for the first time
